data.title: CollisionShape2D visual editor
data.body:
A simple visual editor for the CollisionShape2D node, available for the following shapes:
- CapsuleShape2D
- CircleShape2D
- RayShape2D
- RectangleShape2D
- SegmentShape2D

data.title: Fix for issue related to GridMap editor
data.body: - closes #2102

data.title: Develop
WRONG supports for images largest that 4095 pixels
data.body:
When I try to load a Sprite Texture image largest that 4095 pixels, GoDot shows it bad, as if corruption of out-of-memory occurred.

See the attached screenshot.

PS: thanks a lot for the really GREAT WORK! :P

![screenshot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/13015536/8303952/2005ec28-19a2-11e5-8663-8d62df706917.png)

data.title: Shader Material is not unique
data.body: when I duplicate a sprite that has a shader and change the params of shader in one of them , both of them will change, I am instancing this sprite , and I need to change everyone of them separately how can I achieve that? can I make the materials unique in the code?

data.title: Make Github wiki publically editable
data.body:
As mentioned in #2131, it is a very simple task to make the wiki editable by the public. There are a number of users that have expressed a strong desire to improve the documentation and this would allow them to do so.

I know we are waiting for the new community website, but this is a promise made long ago and there is no clear timescale for when it eventually emerges.

Making the wiki editable would be a good stop gap measure, any work done will be moved over to the new site when it emerges.

data.title: autocomplete should search autoloads
data.body:
The autocompletion should support the autoloaded nodes as well. for example, if I have an autoload for SUTjoystick, then get_node("/root/SUT should pop up an autocomplete option to get_node("/root/SUTjoystick")

It could even dig into the autoloaded scene or script for variables, functions, nodes, etc.

data.title: custom font not applied to newly-opened scripts
data.body:
#1496 is somewhat related.

Opening a script for editing ignores the custom font. I have to close out to the project manager, and load the project again and then the opened scripts will have the custom font.

data.title: F5 to refresh file dialog launches project
data.body: I hit F5 in a file open dialog to refresh the view, which appeared to work, but it also launched my project at the same time. This should be prevented when a file dialog is open.

data.title: SSL Not Working
data.body:
I am using a REST API and would like to connect over SSL. I downloaded the CA's public cert and made sure it is PEM encoded, but I'm getting the following error:

Cause: unable to get local issuer certificate
CERT STR: /C=US/O=DigiCert Inc/OU=www.digicert.com/CN=DigiCert High Assurance CA-3

I have the CA's public cert in my Godot project root and checked it off in the Project Settings menu. Any ideas?

Godot console errors....
https://www.dropbox.com/s/6tygegd6hi6twvv/errors.png?dl=0

data.title: StyleBox content margin top & bottom does not affect on Button's icon
data.body:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8281454/8299267/1c7af968-19b1-11e5-82fa-40e864f689e0.png)

Icon is not affected when set content margin top or bottom.
Only label is affected.

data.title: Can't use Ctrl-A to select all in tool mode
data.body:
1. Choose any LineEdit in any Godot's tab ( for example pos of some node ).
2. Double click to edit it.
3. Hit Ctrl-A to select all text in this line edit.
4. "Add new node" window will appear instead of selecting all text.

data.title: Duplicate of Path2D is a new reference not a full copy
data.body:
1. Create a Path2D
2. Hit Duplicate button
3. Apply changes on any of two paths
4. Changes will appear on both paths.

It's very nice effect, but only when you want it. So make it as a feature, and show it clearly to user.

data.title: 3D 180 Y axis rotation + move() = bug
issues and suggestions for the editor
data.body:
There some issues and suggestions with the most recent changes into the editor, since the update between scenes was talked in another issue, i will focus here in the docking.

urgent stuff(so i think):
- If i try to dock 3 or more elements in the same docking area(like putting scenes,resources and filesystem) i cant acess all 3 because the arrows that change the tabs are not working.
- Not related to the editor, but the article in the wiki about gdscript have text issues, like this one:
  https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/wiki/gdscript
  "Any string that restricts itself to alphabetic characters (â€™aâ€™ to â€™zâ€™ and â€™Aâ€™ to â€™Zâ€™), digits (â€™0â€™ to â€™9â€™) and â€™_â€™ qualifies as an identifier. Additionally, identifiers must not begin with a digit. Identifiers are case-sensitive (â€™fooâ€™ is different to â€™FOOâ€™)."

not so urgent stuff(so i think):
- Its seems that you have created 4 docking areas in each side of the main area, it would be good if there was more docking areas (in the top and bottom parts), also, it would be nice if we could move the main area directly.
- Would be nice if we could undock the tabs of 2d,3d,Script and help, also we could undock (and dock in other docking are) the output.
- Speaking of it, it would be nice if we could just close all those dockable elements (so if i think i will not use the 3d in a project, i could just close it and reopen it later)
- Since now editor is becoming more configurable, we could have editor profiles. So i could use a profile more suited to using the script while i am caring the code area and another more suited to edit the nodes when i am caring about the more visual area.
- Also, some elements (not all of then) could be undocked to a external window. (for example, the Script that is kind of independent of the rest). So we can see the two at same time if we have two screens or simple use alt+tab. (another good example to this would be the output, that would work greatly in two screens... man i need two screens :( )

data.title: Reload all scenes button in editor
data.body:
From the Facebook group discussion.

Please add reload all edited scenes button.

Thanks! :D

data.title: Add .editorconfig
data.body:
This may be helpful for define code style.
http://editorconfig.org

data.title: Grid/Tile map editor new item palette
data.body: Changed the Grid/Tile map editor item palette from a Tree widget to a ItemList widget. Adding new features to the palette like the item name at bottom of preview, the number of columns are defined by the width of the widget, and list view of the items.

data.title: Opacity not working for distance field font
data.body:
A label with a distance field font assigned won't change it's opacity.

Example: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1641659/font_opacity.zip

data.title: get_current_scene() is null when changing scenes
data.body:
Using https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/wiki/tutorial_singletons for changing between scenes cause get_tree().get_current_scene() to be null

Example: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1641659/get_tree_get_current_scene_test.zip

data.title: Scripts and assets in sub-directories cause problems
data.body:
Related to #1808 and #1921 . When exporting the game, and running the exported version, it will throw an error of the asset or script not being found. This can be very frustating if you don't know about this issue.

The workaround for now is just restarting the editor, it seems that when it first load the project the paths are correct.

data.title: More vs scons changes
data.body: This sets the NMAKE build command stuff in the visual studio project properties. Unfortunately it uses the target=? passed into SCONS to set all of the Visual Studio configurations with that target.

data.title: added GDscript bidings for UndoRedo class
data.body:
- added GDscript bidings for UndoRedo class mechanizm
- registered UndoRedo class

There was no option to use undo/redo mechanizm in GDscipted plugins. It works fine now.

data.title: Initialize Doxygen Documentation
data.body: Wasn't sure if you were interested in this or not? Didn't know if you had prior experience with Doxygen. There are some nice things about it. We could start marking up code if you would like.

data.title: Problem with file: grid_map_editor_plugin.cpp Ln: 307
data.body: In this line of code it uses a segment of length 500.0. I created a default scene, with a default gridmap using tiles from the Platformer demo. And the distance far exceeded 500. Had to change to greater than 3000 before the segment finally intersected the plane. Unsure how to fix this any other way.

data.title: REQUEST:: Cone/Pyramid/Cylinder primitive types for collision/physics bounds
data.body:
As mentioned, Godot's physics engine is missing a very common shape type for use as a collision bound.

We have fancy shapes like _capsule_ and _convex_, but we still lack a trio of basic collider shapes, that is the cone, the cylinder, and the pyramid.

Getting these committed will more or less complete the set as far as collision bounds go, I hope you will find it a good thing to include.

data.title: change_scene() function does not support 3D games.
data.body:
Download this file, play it, and press 'enter' to switch the scene.
http://www.mediafire.com/download/dmvwzu4npwxqm89/Test.zip

In my game, I have to use the old way to change scenes because the function has no support for 3D games at all (2D graphics load in fine). What you'll see is that instead of seeing the new scene with two cubes, you get something grey and empty.

I can see this virtually eliminating the chance of Godot 1.1 making any headway in getting 3D-centric users, a fix in my view should be high priority.

Confirmed on a Win7 64 bit machine with an ATI 7xxx GPU, 16 gigs of RAM and an i7 processor. The latest drivers are installed.

Thanks.
